game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in the jungle.
game.description: You have heard rumors about a lost treasure hidden deep in the jungle. Your objective is to explore the jungle, solve puzzles, and overcome obstacles to find the treasure.

task.description: Captain Morgan has told you that the treasure can only be found with the help of an ancient map. Search his shipwreck for clues to locate the map.
